EmailTemplate.name: Send to Accounting
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} - Loan #{!Opportunity.Deal_Loan_Number__c} Closing Tomorrow - Yardi Upload
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Accounting,
This has been rate locked today. Please see the attached document's for your review in anticipation of tomorrow's closing.
Please confirm when Yardi has been prepared for closing.
Thank you.
{!Opportunity.Closer__c}
